author: smarlex
title: Glow Formal Verification Stage 2
description: Unverified smart contracts can lead to catastrophic consequences: data leaks, loss of assets, etc.
solution: A formal verification engine for the Glow language that enables automatic checking of programmer supplied assertions.
experience: MuKn (Mutual Knowledge Systems, Inc.) are the team behind the Glow language, and delivered a proof of concept version for Catalyst Fund 5.
